cart.name: BROOKLYN REED DIFFUSER
cart.description: Our Escapist collection takes you to our favorite places in the world, places we’ve traveled to that have a permanent place in our olfactory memories. Pick three to try, gift, or savor individually. Hand-poured in screenprinted glass votives and packaged in a perfectly giftable luxurious textured box. Made in Brooklyn, New York with 100% soy wax for an eco-friendly clean burn. We use lead-free cotton wicks and premium fragrance oils infused with essential oils. Our candles are vegan, cruelty-free, phthalate-free, and petroleum-free.

proucts.name: HAWAII RAIN MINIMALIST CANDLE
proucts.description:
TOP NOTES: Raindrops, Lemon Peel
MIDDLE NOTES: Bitter Orange, Coconut Water
BASE NOTE: White Woods, River Jasmine

Imagine sheltering from the rain underneath the tree canopies in the dense Hawaiian mountains, surrounded by the most beautiful blooms and fragrant plantlife. With notes of coconut water and bitter orange, river jasmine and raindrops, that is precisely what Hawaii Rain evokes. 

Made in Brooklyn, New York with 100% soy wax for an eco-friendly clean burn. We use lead-free cotton wicks and premium fragrance oils infused with essential oils. Our candles are vegan, cruelty-free, phthalate-free, and petroleum-free.

proucts.name: SWEET FIG MINIMALIST CANDLE
proucts.description:
TOP NOTES: Rosewood
MIDDLE NOTES: Mediterranean Fig
BASE NOTE: Amber, Patchouli

Summon your inner hippie with the earthy, ripe aroma of a freshly picked fig. This refreshing and soothing scent is perfect for burning during early morning yoga or meditation practices.

Our Sweet Fig Candles are hand-crafted to take you on a sensory journey. The rich, succulent aroma of our fig-scented candles melds with gentle undertones of earth and wood, crafting soothing fragrances that are as complex as they are comforting. 

Whether you're searching for the perfect gift or looking to freshen up your own home, our team is dedicated to making unique scents that meet your needs. If you’re looking for a truly one-of-a-kind experience, we create the best fig candles that will transport you to another world. Each time the wick is lit, the room fills with a soothing and fruity fig candle scent, allowing your senses to travel to the sun-soaked green hills of the Mediterranean.

Our Sweet Fig scented candles were designed to invoke the free spirit and tranquil essence of nature, drawing inspiration from the Mediterranean fig tree groves. Our custom scent tells a story, capturing the fruity smell of fig with the grounding earthiness that connects us to our roots. Since ancient times, the fig has been associated with knowledge, growth, and harmony, often seen as a symbol of life's luxuriant richness. 

Our Mediterranean fig candle is more than just a candle — it's an experience designed to ignite your body and soul. Simply light one of our Sweet Fig candles and imagine yourself on a Roman holiday, enveloping your senses with top notes of rosewood, middle notes of Mediterranean fig, and base notes of amber and patchouli. 

Our Sweet Fig candles are made in Brooklyn, New York with 100% soy wax for an eco-friendly clean burn. We use lead-free cotton wicks and premium fragrance oils infused with essential oils. Our candles are vegan, cruelty-free, phthalate-free, and petroleum-free.
